feature.label: TCAT Document Image Analysis Modules
feature.description: Document image analysis algorithms implemented by the Texas Center for Applied Technology. These are designed to serve as modular impelementations of specific image analysis tasks that can be combined to produce DIA systems to support work with both historical and modern documents.
